Question
========

Suppose it is given that for a given patient population, the hemoglobin (Hb) level is normally distributed with μ = 13.5 and σ = 1.2. We randomly draw one person from this population. How high should the Hb of this person be at most to belong to the lowest 15% of the population? belong?

Answerlist
----------

* 11.4558
* 12.2089
* 12.2563
* 13.0539

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 11.4558: Incorrect
* 12.2089: Incorrect
* 12.2563: Correct
* 13.0539: Incorrect
